DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety and tolerability of TIVa or TIVb vaccine in healthy children and adolescents 4 to 17 years of age.
DOC.brief_title: Safety of Two Trivalent Influenza Vaccines Evaluated in Children and Adolescents 4 to 17 Years of Age
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects 417 years of age Subjects who are not healthy, Subjects who are pregnant or breast feeding, Subjects with a history of severe allergic reaction or allergic to any of the vaccine components.
